title: Riot, please
body:
https://i.gyazo.com/5de7110cf79aa3029893b14d0727b833.png

That mission is not possible on a low-level account because no one wards. Please make it into an or mission.

replies.body:
I completed both in 3 games. Buy controls wards and play adc / sup / jg and just drop them in the bushes down there. 

Alternative is control ward lane bushes and just sit in them

Uhh this is literally the easiest quest to complete. All you have to do is buy a level 9 sweepers and go around dragon, baron, enemy jungle. Or if they're bad just go to their lane brushes. There are 5 people on each team, each member gets 2 wards. That's 10 wards every 2 minutes or so, depending on the enemy level. You're probably not looking hard enough because i complete this in one go without even trying every time i got it.
and any wards you do find, allies either flash to steal or have higher aa speed and just wait for it to get to 1 hp, trust me that happens... a lot...
